segments.advisor_message: So, uh, just to wrap this up, can you tell me about your, um, current state of health?
segments.client_message: Yeah, um, well, I'm, like, it's okay, I guess. No major issues or anything, but, uh, I do smoke, like, maybe ten cigarettes a day?

segments.advisor_message: Alright, and, um, do you, like, have any long-term care needed or, ya know, plans for that?
segments.client_message: Oh, uh, not really right now, but, I mean, sometimes I think I might need, like, help later, um, you know?

segments.advisor_message: Sure, that makes sense. Uh, do you have a will or, um, any power of attorney set up?
segments.client_message: I, uh, have a will, I think, at least I did it maybe last year, and, um, my sister has power of attorney, but, uh, I gotta check how all that is, maybe?
